definitions.title: n.m
definitions.body: Ct So 8:13, united, associate, companion—´[[ח]] abs. Pr 28:24, Ps 119:68; sf. [[חֲבֵרוֹ]] Ec 4:10 (+ 3 t. Ez Kt; Qr [[חבריו]] v. infr.); pl. [[חֲבֵרִים]] Ju Jdg 20:11, Ct So 8:13 cstr. [[חַבְרֵי]] Is 1:23; sf. [[חֲבֵרֶָךָ]] Ps 45:8, [[חֲבֵרֶָיךָ]] Ct So 1:7; [[חֲבֵרָיו]] Is 44:11 + 3 t;. Ez Qr;—
adj. united [[כְּאִישׁ אֶחָד חֲבֵרִים]] Ju Jdg 20:11 knit together as one man (AV RV).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of children (tribes) of Isr. assoc. with Judah as head Ez Eze 37:16; id. assoc. with Joseph (Ephr.) as head v:Eze 37:16, v:Eze 37:19 (in all these rd. Qr [[חֲבֵרָיו]]).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: worshippers (associates, belonging to the society or guild) of idols Is 44:11 (v. Che; > others priests, Geiger umschr,121 493 SS, cf. [[חֶבֶר]] Ho 6:9; Du rds. [[חֲבָרִים]] enchantments).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: implying likeness of character Is 1:23, Pr 28:24, Ps 119:63.
companion at a particular time Ec 4:10.
